citations.narrative:
** The facility offers Sloth encounters to the public. The encounters include the Sloth hugging and or its head and mouth
next to the paying guest head and throat area. This has been verified by photographic evidence from the facility's social
media page. During public exhibition the animal must be handled so there is minimal risk of harm to the animal and public.
The facility is not providing that. The Sloth could bite or scratch the person holding the animal which could also possibly
injure the animal. The facility has to take measures to ensure that the Sloth is not around the face head and neck area of
the public. Any animal must be handled so there is minimal risk of harm to the animal and to the public. To be corrected
from this day forward, 08-05-2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.131(c)(1) 
   
Handling of animals. 
** The facility offers Sloth encounters to the public. The encounters include the Sloth hugging and or its head and mouth 
next to the paying guest head and throat area. This has been verified by photographic evidence from the facility's social 
media page. During public exhibition the animal must be handled so there is minimal risk of harm to the animal and public. 
The facility is not providing that. The Sloth could bite or scratch the person holding the animal which could also possibly 
injure the animal. The facility has to take measures to ensure that the Sloth is not around the face head and neck area of 
the public. Any animal must be handled so there is minimal risk of harm to the animal and to the public. To be corrected 
from this day forward, 08-05-2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
